forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
